updateInformationDescription: Keep your profile up to date to ensure accurate information.
name: Name
descriptionPermissionUser: Assign or remove permissions for this user
emailVerificationDescription: Make sure your email address is verified so we can reach you securely and provide important account updates.
emailVerifiedDescription: You will receive important updates at {{email}}
emailNotVerifiedDescription: Please verify your email to ensure secure communication.
twoFADescription: Add an extra layer of protection to your account by enabling two-factor authentication.
twoFAEnabledDescription: Your account is protected with two-factor authentication.
twoFADisabledDescription: We strongly recommend enabling 2FA to enhance your account security.
userPanelDescription: Manage your personal information, security, and account preferences all in one place.
forgotPasswordDescription: Enter your email address and we will send instructions to reset your password.
resetPasswordDescription: Create a new password for your account
updatePasswordDescription: Change your account password. Make sure it is strong and secure.
